frameset.edef: to take the lives of / claim the lives of

role.argrole: agent - reason for loss of life

example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اودت) (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM اعمال) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN عنف))))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-6 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-6)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (NP (NOUN_NUM 600)) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN_NUM+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN_POSS الفي) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN مدني))))))))))

role.argrole: the loss of life - marked by ب
